name: Miller Industries, Inc.
description: Miller Industries, Inc. is a leading manufacturer and provider of towing and recovery equipment, known for its commitment to innovation and quality. Founded in 1990 and headquartered in Ooltewah, Tennessee, Miller Industries has built a reputation for producing a wide range of products, including wreckers, flatbeds, and specialty vehicles. The company's offerings cater to various sectors, including emergency services, automotive, and industrial markets, ensuring that they meet the diverse needs of their customers. With a focus on engineering excellence, Miller Industries employs advanced technologies and materials to enhance the performance and durability of its equipment. Their product line includes well-known brands such as Century, Vulcan, and Challenger, which are trusted by towing professionals across the globe. Miller Industries prides itself on providing exceptional customer service and support, demonstrated through a robust dealer network and comprehensive training programs for operators. The company is dedicated to sustainability and continuously seeks ways to reduce its environmental impact through efficient manufacturing practices and innovative product designs. With a forward-thinking approach, Miller Industries is positioned to lead the industry in towing and recovery solutions.
